description: Manages routers on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

account.description: Account the router is related to.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the router is related to.

domain.description: Domain the router is related to.

service_offering.description: Name or id of the service offering of the router.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.
